program combined

   implicit none

   integer :: n, num, cnt(0:20), res

   character(len=20) :: s, second_output, third_output

   integer, parameter :: max_steps = 1000

   integer :: x(max_steps), y(max_steps), k, i, j, dx, dy

   logical :: flag, s_third

   ! First program's processing

   read *, n

   cnt = 0 do i = 1, n

      read *, num

      cnt(num +10) = cnt(num +10) +1

   end do

   res = 0

   do i = 0,9

      res = res + cnt(i)*cnt(20 -i)

   end do

   res = res + cnt(10)*(cnt(10)-1)/2

   ! Convert res to string s

   write(s, '(i0)') res

   s = adjustl(s)

   ! Second program's processing

   k = 1

   x(1) = 0

   y(1) = 0

   do i = 1, len_trim(s)

      character(len=1) :: c = s(i:i)

      select case (c)

      case ('L')

         x(k+1) = x(k) -1

         y(k+1) = y(k)

      case ('R')

         x(k+1) = x(k) +1

         y(k+1) = y(k)

      case ('U')

         x(k+1) = x(k)

         y(k+1) = y(k) +1

      case ('D')

Here's the full code:

program combined

   implicit none

   integer :: n, num, cnt(0:20), res

   character(len=20) :: s, second_output, third_output

   integer, parameter :: max_steps = 1000

   integer :: x(max_steps), y(max_steps), k, i, j, dx, dy

   logical :: flag, s_third

   ! First program's processing

   read *, n

   cnt = 0

   do i = 1, n

      read *, num

      cnt(num +10) = cnt(num +10) +1

   end do

   res = 0

   do i = 0,9

      res = res + cnt(i)*cnt(20 -i)

   end do

   res = res + cnt(10)*(cnt(10)-1)/2

   ! Convert res to string s

   write(s, '(i0)') res

   s = adjustl(s)

   ! Second program's processing

   k = 1

   x(1) = 0

   y(1) = 0

   do i = 1, len_trim(s)

      character(len=1) :: c = s(i:i)

      select case (c)

      case ('L')

         x(k+1) = x(k) -1

         y(k+1) = y(k)

      case ('R')

         x(k+1) = x(k) +1

         y(k+1) = y(k)

      case ('U')

         x(k+1) = x(k)

         y(k+1) = y(k) +1

      case ('D')

         x(k+1) = x(k)

         y(k+1) = y(k) -1

      case default

         x(k+1) = x(k)

         y(k+1) = y(k)

      end select

      k = k +1

   end do

   flag = .true.

   do i = 1, k-3

      do j = i+3, k

         dx = abs(x(i) - x(j))

         dy = abs(y(i) - y(j))

         if ( (dx <=1 .and. dy ==0) .or. (dy <=1 .and. dx ==0) ) then

            flag = .false.

            exit

         end if

      end do

      if (.not. flag) exit

   end do

   if (flag) then

      second_output = 'OK'

   else

      second_output = 'BUG'

   end if

   ! Third program's processing

   third_output = ''

   s_third = .false.

   do i = 1, len_trim(second_output)

      character(len=1) :: c = second_output(i:i)

      if (c == '.') then

         if (s_third) then

            third_output = third_output // '1'

            s_third = .false.

         else

            third_output = third_output // '0'

         end if

      else

         if (s_third) then

            third_output = third_output // '2'

            s_third = .false.

         else

            s_third = .true.

         end if

      end if

   end do

   ! Output the result

   print '(A)', trim(third_output)

end program combined
